title: Weds Post Show (08-24-22)
itunes:title: Weds Post Show (08-24-22)
description:
Amy talks about the Brittany Murphy documentary about her death. Lunchbox wants us to help him make the news. Bobby and Mike D had a late night playing cards last night. Bobby was fascinated that Mike was competitive like he is. Schools are offering mental health days and we get into why Raymundo is stressed all the time. We get an update on Lunchbox’s role during Bat out of Hell in Vegas.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
